SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 13
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
13
NLP systems including
multilinguality: Genoma-KB
– Ontological Module: (MikroKosmos) 21 basic concepts:
ALL, OBJECT (physical, mental, social), EVENT (physical, 
mental, social),  PROPERTY (attribute, relation), etc.
• Feliu (2004) describes certain relations
– Similarity, Hyponymy, Sequential relations (place and time)
– Causality, Instrument, Meronymy, Association
– Terminological Module:
• Multilinguality, POS, context, sources, lemma, administrative 
information
– Corpus Module: multilingual texts (En-Cat-Sp)
– Entities Module:
• Bibliography: complete references of terms and texts
• Factual module: research centres, people, institutions, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
